name: Combat Stance Switch
desc: Drop into a low lunge, rotate 180 degrees on your heels without standing up. Ninja hips.

name: Seated 90/90 Hover
desc: In 90/90, lift both hands. Try to lift your front knee 1 inch off the floor. Internal strength.

name: The Crouching Tiger
desc: From a deep squat, crawl forward as low as possible, belly almost touching the floor.

name: Stealth Under-Desk Toe Crunch
desc: While seated, curl your toes into the floor like you're trying to grab a pencil. Arch health.

name: Standing Knee Circle (The Gate)
desc: Lift knee to chest, open it wide to the side, and rotate it back down. Lubricates the socket.

name: The Stealth Shrug
desc: In a meeting: pull shoulders to ears, hold 5s, then drop them and pull blades down. Neck relief.

name: Shin Box to Combat Lunge
desc: From 90/90, drive hips up and step one leg forward into a lunge in one smooth motion.

name: Knuckle Plank Hold
desc: Hold a plank on your knuckles. Aligns the wrist and toughens the hand structure.

name: The Invisible Chair Lift
desc: Seated. Press hands into the chair and lift your butt 1 inch. Hold for 10s. Secret tricep work.

name: Wall-Supported High Kick Prep
desc: Hand on wall. Lift leg to the side at hip height. Pulse it up 1 inch, 20 times. Hip power.

name: The 'Meeting' Ankle Pump
desc: While seated, lift heels, then lift toes. Repeat 50 times to prevent blood pooling.

name: Cossack Flow (Low)
desc: Slide side to side in deep lateral lunges. Your head should stay at the same height the whole time.

name: Primal Scapular Reach
desc: On all fours. Reach one arm as far forward as possible while keeping the other elbow locked.

name: Stealth Glute Squeeze
desc: Squeeze your left glute for 5s, then right. Do it while standing in line. Nobody knows.

name: The Archer Row (No Weight)
desc: Reach one arm forward, pull the other back hard. Squeeze the shoulder blade like you're pulling a 100lb bow.

name: Seated Spinal Ripple
desc: Start a wave from your tailbone that travels up to your head while sitting. Liquid spine.

name: The Stealth Pec Stretch
desc: Interlace fingers behind your back while sitting. Lean forward slightly and lift hands.

name: Tiger Paw Wrist Stretch
desc: On all fours. Fingers curled like a claw. Gently lean weight into the 'paws'.

name: Kneeling Heel Sit (Toes Tucked)
desc: The 'Ninja Rest'. Sit on your heels with toes tucked. Toughens the feet for impact.

name: Lateral Ape (High Velocity)
desc: Hands down, hop feet across. Try to stay in the air as long as possible. Wrist stability.

name: The Stealth Neck Pivot
desc: Slowly look over your shoulder during a conversation. Move from the very top of the spine.

name: Knee-to-Shoulder Pull
desc: Lying on back. Pull knee to the SAME side shoulder. Hits the deep hip flexors.

name: The Dragon Squat
desc: Cross one leg behind the other and squat until the back knee is near the front heel. Balance king.

name: Stealth Wrist Circles
desc: Hands under the table. Interlace fingers and roll the wrists in a smooth '8' pattern.

name: The Cat Stretch (Standing)
desc: Hands on wall. Round your back, then arch it. Segmental movement without the floor.

name: Single Leg RDL Reach
desc: Hinge on one leg. Reach hands forward like you're grabbing a ninja sword. Long line.

name: The Stealth Calf Pulse
desc: Standing in a meeting. Lift heels 1/2 inch off the floor and hold. Subtle but effective.

name: Tripod Extension
desc: From beast, lift one arm and opposite leg. Reach them away from each other. Balance.

name: The Ninja Roll (Slow)
desc: Roll from your back to your stomach without using your hands. Pure core and coordination.

name: Stealth Ribcage Shift
desc: While sitting, slide your ribcage left and right without moving your hips. Hits the QL muscle.

name: Ape Reach to Stand
desc: Deep squat ape reach, then drive through heels to stand while keeping arms reaching forward.

name: The Stealth Forearm Flex
desc: Make a fist, squeeze hard for 10s, then splay fingers wide. Do this 10 times under the desk.

name: Single-Leg Balance (Knee Out)
desc: Stand on one leg. Lift the other knee and point it 90 degrees to the side. Hold 30s.

name: The Stealth Pelvic Tilt
desc: Sit tall. Tuck your tailbone, then arch your back. Small movements to keep the discs hydrated.

name: Beast to Downward Dog
desc: From a hovering beast, push hips back and up into a pike. Stretch the lats and calves.

name: The Stealth Ear-to-Shoulder
desc: Tilt head slowly. Use your mind to imagine the muscle lengthening. No hands needed.

name: Shin Box Extension
desc: In 90/90, drive hips up until you are kneeling tall. Squeeze glutes at the top.

name: The Stealth Thumb Stretch
desc: Tuck your thumb into your palm, wrap fingers over it, and tilt your wrist down. Relief for scrollers.

name: Side Kick Isometric Hold
desc: Hold your leg out to the side as high as possible. Try to keep it there for 20 seconds.

name: The Stealth Big Toe Press
desc: While standing, press only your big toes into the floor. Feel your arch wake up.

name: Loaded Beast to Front Step
desc: From loaded beast, spring forward and land one foot outside your hand in a deep lunge.

name: Stealth Shoulder Blade Circles
desc: Move your shoulder blades in a circle without moving your arms. Pure ninja posture.

name: The 'Hidden' Hamstring Stretch
desc: Sit at the edge of your chair. Extend one leg, heel down. Lean forward 1 inch. Feel the pull.

name: Crab to Tabletop
desc: From a crab position, drive hips up until your torso is parallel to the floor. Open shoulders.

name: The Stealth Chin Tuck
desc: Pull your head back like you're making a double chin. Realigns the spine with the skull.

name: Ninja Landing (Static)
desc: Hold the bottom of a squat on your toes. Balance with fingertips on the floor.

name: Stealth Jaw Release
desc: Place the tip of your tongue on your palate and open your mouth slightly. Relaxes the face.

name: The 'Ninja' Finger Plank
desc: Leaning against a wall, hold yourself up with only your fingertips. Incredible for grip health.

name: Stealth Diaphragm Breath
desc: Breathe so only your belly moves, not your chest. Calm the ninja mind.

name: The Spider-Man Step (Static)
desc: Lunge forward, back knee off floor. Drop both elbows to the inside of the front foot.

name: The Stealth Leg Extension
desc: While sitting, straighten one leg under the desk and hold for 10s. Keep the quad awake.

name: Underswitch (Slow Motion)
desc: Perform an underswitch so slowly that it takes 10 seconds to complete. Pure stability.

name: Stealth Tricep Stretch
desc: Reach one hand behind your neck. Use the headrest of your chair to gently push your elbow back.

name: The Samurai Knee Sit
desc: Kneel with tops of feet flat. Sit on heels. The classic Seiza position for ankle health.

name: Stealth Eye Focus
desc: Look at something far away, then something 1 inch from your nose. Exercises the ciliary muscles.

name: Beast Shoulder Taps (Ninja)
desc: In beast, tap opposite shoulder. Imagine a glass of water on your backâ€”don't spill a drop.

name: Stealth Wrist Flexion
desc: Make a fist, bend the wrist inward. Hold. Great for counter-acting typing fatigue.

name: The Dragon Walk (Static)
desc: Hold a deep, crossed-leg squat. Stay as low as possible for 30 seconds.

name: Stealth Mid-Back Squeeze
desc: Try to touch your elbows together behind your back. Opens the chest instantly.

name: Kettlebell Halo (Ninja Style)
desc: In a kneeling 'combat' stance, circle the weight around your head. Stability under pressure.

name: The Stealth Ankle Roll
desc: While sitting, lift one foot and draw a circle with your heel, not your toes.

name: Primal Bear to Crab Transition
desc: Flow from bear to crab and back without your butt ever touching the ground.

name: Stealth Elbow Circles
desc: Arms at sides. Rotate only the forearms in a circle from the elbow joint.

name: The Ninja Bridge
desc: From your back, push up into a full bridge. Hold for 3 breaths and lower slowly.

name: Stealth Quadricep Squeeze
desc: Squeeze your quads as hard as possible for 10s while sitting. Keeps the knees stable.

name: Lateral Beast (Ninja Speed)
desc: Move sideways in beast position as fast as possible for 10 feet, then stop instantly.

name: Stealth Forehead Press
desc: Press your palm into your forehead; resist with your neck. Isometric neck strength.

name: The Samurai Sword Reach
desc: Lunge. Reach one arm across your body and up to the sky. Stretches the lateral line.

name: Stealth Foot Scrunch
desc: Try to 'shorten' your foot by pulling the ball toward the heel. Do it inside your shoes.

name: Beast to Scorpion Flow
desc: From beast, lift one leg and rotate it all the way over until you are in a bridge.

name: Stealth Chest Expansion
desc: Inhale deeply into your collarbones. Hold 5s. Feel the upper ribs open.

name: The Ninja Pivot (Standing)
desc: Stand. Pivot 180 on the balls of your feet. Stay perfectly upright. Balance.

name: Stealth Hand Clench
desc: Clench hands into fists, then splay fingers as hard as possible. 20 reps.

name: Single Leg Squat (Ninja Variation)
desc: Squat on one leg, reaching the other leg forward and arms back. Pure counter-balance.

name: Stealth Ear-to-Shoulder (Slow)
desc: Tilt your head 1 millimeter per second. Find the exact spot of tension.

name: The Crouching Monkey
desc: Deep squat. Shift your weight onto your toes and bounce gently. Ankle spring.

name: Stealth Pelvic Floor Lift
desc: The ultimate hidden exercise. Lift the pelvic floor, hold 5s, release. Core foundation.

name: Beast Kick-Through (Slow)
desc: Rotate and kick your leg through. Hold the end position for 3 seconds. Tension!

name: Stealth Shoulder Roll (One side)
desc: Roll only the right shoulder. Then only the left. De-couples the spine.

name: The Ninja Plank
desc: Plank position on elbows. Pull your elbows toward your toes without moving. High tension.

name: Stealth Belly Wave
desc: Try to move your upper abs, then lower abs in a wave. Internal organ massage.

name: Cossack Squat (Ninja Reach)
desc: Deep lateral lunge. Reach arms in the opposite direction of the lunge.

name: Stealth Finger Stretch
desc: Press each finger individually against the edge of the desk. Stretches the tendons.

name: The Samurai Lunge
desc: Deep lunge. Arms straight up. Look up at the ceiling. Stretch the whole front chain.

name: Stealth Neck Side-Slide
desc: Move your head side to side like a pigeon without tilting. Improves cervical gliding.

name: Beast to Alternating Kick
desc: From beast, jump and switch which leg is kicking through the window.

name: Stealth Lower Back Press
desc: Press your lower back into the chair as hard as possible. Engages the deep core.

name: The Ninja Crouch (Heels Down)
desc: Squat so deep your hamstrings touch your calves. Keep heels flat. The goal of all mobility.

name: Stealth Upper Trap Release
desc: Shrug shoulders, hold, then exhale and imagine them melting into the floor.

name: Ape Side-Shift
desc: In a deep squat, shift your weight left and right without your head moving up.

name: Stealth Wrist Extension (Table)
desc: Press your palms together under the table. Push hard to stretch the wrists.

name: The Ninja Balance (Toe-to-Heel)
desc: Stand with one foot directly in front of the other. Close eyes. Hold for 30s.

name: Stealth Ribcage Expansion
desc: Breathe into your back. Try to feel your shirt tighten against your shoulder blades.

name: Loaded Beast to Cobra
desc: Flow from the back-loaded position directly into a high chest upward dog.

name: Stealth Neck Extension
desc: Gently look up at the ceiling. Move the stretch to the front of the throat.

name: The Samurai Kneel (One Leg)
desc: One knee down, one foot forward. Sit back onto the back heel. Intense quad stretch.

name: Stealth Elbow Tuck
desc: Try to touch your elbows together behind your back while keeping arms straight.

name: Ninja Finger Tap
desc: Tap each finger to your thumb as fast as possible. Coordination and speed.

name: Stealth Mid-Back Twist
desc: Rotate only your upper back while keeping your belly button facing forward.

name: The Final Ninja Bow
desc: Wide stance. Fold forward and touch your head to the floor. The ultimate goal.
